mapper.select: SELECT gt.goods_type_id, gt.goods_type_name,gt.goods_type_pid FROM goods_typeinfo gt

SELECT gd.goods_id,gd.goods_name, gd.goods_price,gd.goods_sales,gd.goods_attr, gd.goods_count,img.image_path goods_images, gs.standard_name,gs.standard_id,gs.standard_price, gs.standard_count,gs.standard_weight FROM goodsinfo gd INNER JOIN goods_image gi ON gi.goods_id = gd.goods_id INNER JOIN image_space img ON img.image_id = gi.image_id LEFT JOIN goods_standard gs ON gs.goods_id = gd.goods_id WHERE gd.goods_id = #{goodsId}

SELECT gd.goods_id,gd.goods_name, gd.goods_price,gd.goods_sales,gd.goods_attr, gd.goods_count,img.image_path goods_images, gs.standard_name,gs.standard_id,gs.standard_price, gs.standard_count,gs.standard_weight FROM goodsinfo gd INNER JOIN goods_image gi ON gi.goods_id = gd.goods_id INNER JOIN image_space img ON img.image_id = gi.image_id LEFT JOIN goods_standard gs ON gs.goods_id = gd.goods_id INNER JOIN qm_branch_goods qbg ON qbg.goods_id = gd.goods_id INNER JOIN qm_branch qb ON qb.branch_id = qbg.branch_id INNER JOIN user u ON u.team_department_id = qb.department_id INNER JOIN customer c ON c.promoter_id = u.user_id WHERE gd.goods_id = #{goodsId} AND c.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT im.image_path FROM image_space im INNER JOIN goods_image gi ON gi.image_id = im.image_id WHERE gi.goods_img_type = 1 AND gi.goods_id = #{goodsId} LIMIT 1
SELECT branch_id FROM qm_branch qb INNER JOIN user u ON u.team_department_id = qb.department_id INNER JOIN customer c ON c.promoter_id = u.user_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT gs.standard_id,gs.standard_name,gs.standard_price, gs.standard_weight, qbg.standard_count FROM goods_standard gs INNER JOIN qm_branch_goods qbg ON qbg.standard_id = gs.standard_id WHERE gs.goods_id = #{goodsId} AND qbg.branch_id = #{branchId}
SELECT gi.goods_id,gi.goods_name,gi.goods_attr, gi.goods_sales FROM goodsinfo gi WHERE gi.goods_id = #{goodsId}
SELECT img.image_path FROM image_space img INNER JOIN goods_image gimg ON gimg.image_id = img.image_id WHERE gimg.goods_id = #{goodsId} ORDER BY gimg.sort
